blogPost.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
blogPost.body: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
blogPost.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams
blogPost.author: Arek Der-Sarkissian

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
Covalent通過互動式在線破冰，幫助遠程團隊建立更好的聯繫。開始很簡單：(1)找到一位朋友並訪問我們的網站(2)按右上角的 "開始連接"(3)按 "主機 "然後按 "播放"。

previous.excerpt: PowerRouter is a powerful and easy way to route sales leads to the right salesperson in Salesforce with smart rules you setup in advance. You can build lead/contact distribution rules 10x faster without writing any code.
previous.title: PowerRouter - Route your Salesforce leads 10x faster

localize.description: PowerRouter是一种强大而简单的方法，可以通过您事先设置的智能规则将销售线索路由到Salesforce中的正确销售人员。您可以在不编写任何代码的情况下，以10倍的速度建立销售线索/联系人分配规则。
localize.tagline: 将您的Salesforce销售线索路由速度提高10倍

localize.description: PowerRouter是一種強大而簡單的方法，可以通過您事先設置的智能規則將銷售線索路由到Salesforce中的正確銷售人員。您可以在不編寫任何代碼的情況下，以10倍的速度建立銷售線索/聯繫人分配規則。
localize.tagline: 將您的Salesforce銷售線索路由速度提高10倍

next.excerpt: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
next.title: Coverr 3.0 - Free stock videos for creators. No attribution required.

localize.description: Coverr是一个美丽的免费和独家的库存视频资源，用于商业和非商业用途，不需要注明来源。当您为您的下一个项目搜索视频时，这里应该是您的首选之地。
localize.tagline: 免费库存视频为创作者。无需归属。

localize.description: Coverr是一個美麗的免費和獨家的庫存視頻資源，用於商業和非商業用途，不需要註明來源。當您爲您的下一個項目搜索視頻時，這裏應該是您的首選之地。
localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。
